alert.note: Alert for Grayson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 05 at 3:14AM EST until December 06 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In North Carolina, Ashe and Watauga Counties. In Virginia, Grayson County. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 4 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will turn to the northwest and become gusty beginning Wednesday morning. Gusts could reach 35-45 mph for the highest peaks. Winds will decrease Wednesday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
